short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 京北方浏览器交互组件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is mainly for web page automation testing, it includes the following features:
1) Read the tag and tag attribute information of web elements
2) Read the Document hierarchy information of web elements
3) Read the absolute position of the page element on the screen
4) The simulation of human operating a keyboard and mouse on a web page

Enterprise using this automation testing component can save a lot of repetitive labor and improve the quality of software.
